title: Dark Game Spell Incantation Voices - Female Sound Effects
description: Dark Game Spell Incantation Voices Female brings producers and sound designers a versatile and wide ranging selection of 390 fantasy game styled magic voices, spiritual vocal spells, & enchanting game sound effects.
longDescription:
Dark Game Spell Incantation Voices Female brings producers and sound designers a versatile and wide ranging selection of 390 fantasy game styled magic voices, spiritual vocal spells, & enchanting game sound effects. This designed magic voice spell sound effects library features a female shaman game character inspired by Dark Souls, Skyrim, & Blood-borne. 


Here is the audio demo


Useful in MMO, RPG, animations, video games, mobile apps, motion graphics, film, and software development, Dark Game Spell Incantation Voices Female is a go to collection of magical voice spell incantation voices and audio creativity. Inside you’ll find distinctive, immersive, voice sound effects, vocalizations, special SFX & more. Creating compelling cinematic game characters and outstanding gameplay audio experiences has never been easier.


Explore thru 100 inspiring spell voice sound sets featuring mystical enchants, conjures, summons, ritual chants, imaginative supernatural beings that are perfect for any fantasy production! Each voice sound set will have a couple variations of both dry & wet sound files so you can choose the best performance for your game audio or film sound production.


Dark Game Spell Incantation Voices Female is designed specifically for magic & fantasy games. The audio texture of the entire sound library is self assured, mystical, & emotional. This collection is perfect for designed in-game magic, sweetening pre-existing spell sounds & adds a unique collection of fantasy voice alerts, notifications to your sound bank.
technicalDetails:
390 total files

200 wet voice spell sound effect files

190 dry voice spell sound effect files

Dark magic female voice & spell sound effects library

Game-ready & designed sound effects

Perfect for game developers and sound designers

All in 44.1k 16bit .wav audio file format

Over 287 MB of Audio

Over 23 minutes of audio 

Features 100 magic voice spell sound sets

Professional gibberish, layered voice spells

Demonic conjures, summons

Magic spell casts, & sweeteners 

Most voice sound sets include the following file variations: 2 wet files + 2 dry files

All sound effects are Royalty-Free
